column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi ST. - Thanks for your great review! I'm glad you enjoyed our fare
column2: but apologize for the shortcomings of our ambience. I agree that loud music in a restaurant is not for everyone
column3: and I'm the type who enjoys dinner over soft music. However
column4: JINYA's business concept is geared towards a trendy and loud atmosphere. It's not going to be all things to all people
column5: but those are the guidelines we are required to follow as a franchisee. I will relay your message to corporate and hopefully we can make some changes in the future.
